channel.title: Visualization on Dripping Data
channel.description: Recent content in Visualization on Dripping Data

item.title: Goodreads Analysis
item.description: I just finished my 2017 Reading Challenge on Goodreads. My goal was to read 15 books this year. Poking around the site I discovered that I could export my data. I decided to have a look to see what my reading habits looked like, and since I was doing this for me, I decided to look at my wifeâ€™s data too. Dataset library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(tidyr) library(ggplot2) library(lubridate) ## ## Attaching package: 'lubridate' ## The following object is masked from 'package:base': ## ## date library(hrbrthemes) books <- read.
